verses.verse: And I said <WH559>, Hear <WH8085>, I pray you <WH7218>, O heads of Jacob <WH3290>, and you princes <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; Is it not for you to know <WH3045> judgment <WH4941>?
Who hate <WH8130> the good <WH2896>, and love <WH157> the evil <WH7451>; who pluck off <WH1497> their skin <WH5785> from off them <WH7607>, and their flesh from off their bones <WH6106>;

Who also eat <WH398> the flesh <WH7607> of my people <WH5971>, and flay <WH6584> their skin <WH5785> from off them <WH6476>; and they break their bones <WH6106>, and chop them in pieces <WH6566>, as for the pot <WH5518>, and as flesh <WH1320> inside <WH8432> the caldron <WH7037>.

Then shall they cry <WH2199> unto the Lord <WH3068>, but he will not hear <WH6030> them <WH5641>: he will even hide his face <WH6440> from them at that time <WH6256>, as they have behaved themselves ill <WH7489> in their doings <WH4611>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> concerning the prophets <WH5030> that make my people <WH5971> err <WH8582>, that bite <WH5391> with their teeth <WH8127>, and cry <WH7121>, Peace <WH7965>; and he that puts <WH5414> not into their mouths <WH6310>, they even prepare <WH6942> war against him <WH4421>.

Therefore night <WH3915> shall be unto you <WH2377>, that you shall not have a vision; and it shall be dark <WH2821> unto you <WH7080>, that you shall not divine; and the sun <WH8121> shall go down <WH935> over the prophets <WH5030>, and the day <WH3117> shall be dark over them <WH6937>.

Then shall the seers <WH2374> be ashamed <WH954>, and the diviners <WH7080> confounded <WH2659>: Yes <WH5844>, they shall all cover their lips <WH8222>; for there is no answer <WH4617> of God <WH430>.

But truly <WH199> I am full <WH4390> of power <WH3581> by the spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068>, and of judgment <WH4941>, and of might <WH1369>, to declare <WH5046> unto Jacob <WH3290> his transgression <WH6588>, and to Israel <WH3478> his sin <WH2403>.

Hear <WH8085> this <WH7218>, I pray you, you heads of the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and princes <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, that abhor <WH8581> judgment <WH4941>, and pervert <WH6140> all equity <WH3477>.
They build up <WH1129> Zion <WH6726> with blood <WH1818>, and Jerusalem <WH3389> with iniquity <WH5766>.

The heads <WH7218> there judge <WH8199> for reward <WH7810>, and the priests <WH3548> there teach <WH3384> for hire <WH4242>, and the prophets <WH5030> there divine <WH7080> for money <WH3701>: yet will they lean <WH8172> upon the Lord <WH3068>, and say <WH559>, Is not the Lord <WH3068> among <WH7130> us <WH7451>? no evil can come upon us <WH935>.

Therefore shall Zion <WH6726> for your sake <WH1558> be plowed <WH2790> as a field <WH7704>, and Jerusalem <WH3389> shall become heaps <WH5856>, and the mountain <WH2022> of the house <WH1004> as the high places <WH1116> of the forest <WH3293>.
